flawed_nl_solution:
He returned 200*0.8=<<200*0.8=160>>160 people
So he had 200-160=<<200-160=36>>36 people
He took 10 of those to another planet so he took 36-10=<<26=26>>26 to his home planet
#### 26

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 40, not 36. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
